item.title: Create an Online Course
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Learn how to create an Online Course

Learn how to create an Online Course with the latest plugin from WooThemes - Sensei. This 3 part series will show you how to create Courses, Lessons, and add a Quiz to assess your learners. item.title: Career Development
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This Course will show you how to integrate Sensei

This Course will show you how to integrate Sensei with WooCommerce in order to sell your Courses. Make sure you have downloaded and setup WooCommerce before beginning this course. Aenean imperdiet. item.title: Professionalism in Business
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
An introduction to theming with Sensei.

Learn how to integrate your themes with Sensei and extend the templating system. This Course will show you where the template files are located and how to add them to your theme.   Aenean imperdiet. item.title: How to Play the Piano
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This introductory course

This introductory course will teach you the basics of playing the piano, starting with chords and rhythm, before moving on to playing full songs.
